response.overview: Four Seasons LIVE brings the MANKAI Company together again for the first time in about four years! This special event will feature live performances of songs that have colored past productions, along with a unique "mixed performance" where troupe members from different units take the stage together.  Look forward to a special stage overflowing with blooming flowers!
response.title: MANKAI STAGE『A3!』Four Seasons LIVE 2024
